item.title: Takt op. Destiny - New anime review
item.author: Author
item.description: Opening art What is it? Well, it is a new anime in development as a joint venture between Madhouse and Mappa animation studies. That’s right, two of the most prolific and relevant animation houses of the late years – see Attack of Titan and Hunter X Hunter. Right to say that the fundamental development of the story is doing by Bandai and DeNA. Also it will have a mobile game version.
